general.description: In a strange twist of fate, Madeleine Enclave was named after the granddaughter of the first commander to be stationed here. The place serves as the Empire's southernmost military base. It was originally little more than a minor depot, but has grown into an important line of defence against the southern pirates in recent cycles.
general.bar: Since traders don't come to this military base, the bar is only frequented by Imperial military personnel. It's more like a canteen than a bar, really.
